metadata.description: From the creators of Grimm Fairy Tales comes an all new series that blends Science Fiction, Fantasy and Horror in one provocative package. You get 48 pages of story in this Giant Sized first issue titles 'The Perfect Mate' - When a man buys a sex robot thinking she will be the answer to all his dreams she really turns out to be his worst nightmare.
metadata.name: Sci-Fi & Fantasy Illustrated
